nodes.text: Gazzari was a planet that was located in the Grumani sector. Gazzari had a breathable atmosphere, but the planetary surface was inhospitable, due to the presence of volcanoes, tectonic activity and acid rain.
Gazzari was studied during a number of Republic surveys and later, during the Republic Dark Age, was located on the frontier between the Daimanate and the Odionate.
In 1032 BBY, it was the site of a major battle between Daiman and Odion which eventually culminated in a joint strike against Lord Bactra who was observing the conflict from orbit.
